name: diam-ai-pilot
description: Educational AI prototype for DIAM course at ISCTE

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:watch: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "cd backend && npm run test:watch" "cd frontend && npm run test:watch"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.perf:backend: cd backend && npm run test -- --testNamePattern="Performance Tests"
